name: SHIBUYA!
description:
You can make a Town just to touch !
Simulation to make super easy , refreshing and Town !
Aim the complete by creating a city of Shibuya of your own !

[ How to play ]
The building will stand When you drag the screen .
Money on will continue to decrease building is standing .
Money will be filled up in 30 minutes .
You will not be able to break the building of construction once .
Population will increase and construction of the road near the building .
The price is the higher the higher the building .
The building is connected automatically when there is a building of the same three-story around at the time of the three-story .
Please uncheck the box " Options " and "人の表示" from the title screen if you feel the process is heavy . (There is no impact on the population ) will soon minute display of people disappear .
If it fails to town making , you can reset the save data " Options " and "街をリセット" from the title screen .
( However, please keep in mind that it can not be restored when you reset once )

[Music material]
I am allowed to use the BGM of the following sites in this game .
